description.value: Health condition considered by a healthcare actor to be a problem; A list of current, active problems that have not been resolved or are existing concerns that are still being monitored.

purpose.value: To provide a concise overview of health conditions affecting the patient. Medical alerts and clinical risks identified e.g. problematic intubation, person with brittle diabetes, immuno-compromised/risk of infection etc. can also be described here.

definition.value: Health condition considered by a healthcare actor to be a problem; A list of current, active problems that have not been resolved or are existing concerns that are still being monitored.

human.value: This is a required IPS Section for conformance and shall not be empty; at the least, some statement is given explaining the missing data.
If content status positive then Current Problems list SHALL be non-empty AND the content status SHALL be omitted.
If content status records absence then Current Problems List SHALL be empty or omitted.

definition.value: The patient has had no previous problems, or the problem information is unknown.
The problem list comprises members that are current, either because they are active, unresolved or of concern and being monitored.
One or more problems are listed; each comprising the same structure describing the nature of the problem and its date of onset.
